TopicTitle: "Plan Kappa" - A KSP graphic novel (Jeb is back in Chapter 53! Well, kinda.)

Articles.Content: I just read everything from the start to now. I must say, you sir know how to make comics. I'll be following this thread to see where the story goes.

@Parkaboy!

I just took the time to read your thread, and it`s just great! I wish you all success in whatever way you turn your story, had a good read and very interesting to see how people play their game actualy! Gonna take a closer look here from time to time!

Very cool thread, i lke it! Greetings:D

(take your time if you do this out of your careersave (obviously?), suddenly from a medium techtree away your imagination want be stopped anymore!)

Edited September 13, 2015 by Mikki
(...(...)...)
Thanks for the comments, everyone. Hope you all enjoy the next chapter:

Fantastic update! This makes sense of a LOT of the parallel timelines, love the graphic construction explaining whence everyone comes from and what happened there. Bill and Bob timeline mental processing is perfect, LOL. And the IVA shots are amazing. How are you getting all those different angles?

Fantastic update! This makes sense of a LOT of the parallel timelines, love the graphic construction explaining whence everyone comes from and what happened there. Bill and Bob timeline mental processing is perfect, LOL. And the IVA shots are amazing. How are you getting all those different angles?

I'm using the Free IVA mod. It's still a long way from its intended purpose, but it's great for taking screenshots.
Awesum
Jeb certainly has a clever interpretation of it.

I'm using the Free IVA mod. It's still a long way from its intended purpose, but it's great for taking screenshots.

Oh my, thank you. Once again you are helping me take my visuals up a notch

Great update, Parkaboy.

I, too, loved Bill and Bob's mental imagery while discussing the timelines.

Happy landings!

Awesome story!

I can't wait for more chapters!
One of the best chapters so far I too loved thought balloons - great way to show what happens in someone's head (without wall of text some so despise ) Also - ARGH! I still can't give you more rep
Wonderful as always! Didn't Glery say she was going isntead of Bob?

Wonderful as always! Didn't Glery say she was going isntead of Bob?

Maybe one of the alternate futures showed that she got killed if she went in Bob's place?

Wonderful as always! Didn't Glery say she was going isntead of Bob?

Glery wanted to go instead of Bill in the first flight of the Avid, but Jeb flew it alone, since it was a rescue mission and he needed the seats. After that the Avid was considered reliable, so flying it wasn't really a gamble. Maybe I'll adress that the next time we see Glery.
Moving on:

wat. da. heck. just. happened. i. dont. get. it.

- - - Updated - - -

And how did you get that internal view on the iffy?

And how did you get that internal view on the iffy?

Free IVA mod.

OOooOOhhhhHHhhhHH SpoooOOooOOooOOoookyyyyyy! Also, 2001: Space Odessey vibes here.

Lol on Jeb taunting Murphys Law.

Edit: Although the whole monolith thing itself is SQUADs shoutout to 2001: Space Odessey.

wat. da. heck. just. happened. i. dont. get. it.

The scene with the monolith on the moon in 2001: Space Odessey might be a hint, but I don't remember much of that scene as it was a brief one. I could look at wiki.

Edit: Or maybe it's not a hint.

Edited September 15, 2015 by smjjames

Your best work ever, I think--outstanding! This is the 2nd time in two days I "must spread rep around" because Parkaboy. Best bits:

--Jeb landing a washing machine

--Bob and Jeb banter RE: death. Bob brings that out in everyone, no matter what color their speech balloons

--Green Kerbals turning pink, brilliant!

--the shot from Mun surface with nightside Kerbin up high

--cropping out the 'alien artifact'

...and of course the MYSTERIOUS DISAPPEARANCE! Dun dun DUUNNNN!!!

Beautifully done!

I loved the references you put in, and the dialogue was very well written.

Best of all is the wonderful sense of ominous mystery you created. Excellent!

Thanks Parkaboy.

Happy landings!

Thanks, folks! Of course the parallels with 2001 aren't a coincidence, given that I had black monoliths to work with, but the story here isn't really an adaptation, it just has a few themes in common. 2001 is my favourite movie after all...
My mind was blown. Where are they? Did they got shunted to parallel dimension? Threwn back (or forward) in time? Fell into a tesseract pocket hidden inside airlock?
Me, I chuckled at the "BDO" and "the pictures look fake" refs.
What just happened? I want to know what happened to them! Maybe they got teleported to an alternate timeline!
Sorry this took so long. It's been a busy week. Hope you enjoy!
